company.description: Valve's debut title, Half-Life, was released in 1998. It won more than 50 game of the year awards, and PC Gamer even called it the Best PC Game Ever. Since then, we've released dozens of titles that changed the world. Today, millions of people play our games every day.
company.name: Valve Corporation

name: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio
summary: Counter-Strike Nexon: Studio is a Free to Play MMOFPS offering competitive PvP and PvE action including content from the original Counter-Strike and all new game modes, map creation function, weapons, and hordes of Zombies!

company.description: Valve's debut title, Half-Life, was released in 1998. It won more than 50 game of the year awards, and PC Gamer even called it the Best PC Game Ever. Since then, we've released dozens of titles that changed the world. Today, millions of people play our games every day.
company.name: Valve Corporation

name: Counter-Strike
summary: Play the world's number 1 online action game. Engage in an incredibly realistic brand of terrorist warfare in this wildly popular team-based game. Ally with teammates to complete strategic missions. Take out enemy sites. Rescue hostages. Your role affects your team's success. Your team's success affects your role.

name: Counter-Strike 2D
summary: CS2D is a free fast-paced top-down multiplayer shooter. Featuring many different game modes, a built-in map editor and much more.

company.description: Valve's debut title, Half-Life, was released in 1998. It won more than 50 game of the year awards, and PC Gamer even called it the Best PC Game Ever. Since then, we've released dozens of titles that changed the world. Today, millions of people play our games every day.

name: Counter-Strike 1.6
summary: Play the world's number 1 online action game. Engage in an incredibly realistic brand of terrorist warfare in this wildly popular team-based game. Ally with teammates to complete strategic missions. Take out enemy sites. Rescue hostages. Your role affects your team's success. Your team's success affects your role.

name: Counter-Strike Neo
summary: Counter-Strike Neo is the Japanese arcade version of the popular Counter-Strike series of games. It added an anime style to the game and toned down its violence.

age_ratings.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 16 years and over only.
It contains: Realistic looking violence -

company.name: Valve Corporation

name: Counter-Strike: Source

platforms.name: Linux
platforms.summary: Linux is a free and open-source (FOSS/FLOSS) Operating System. In a more precise and complex definition, Linux is an open-source OS kernel on which a large variety of Operating Systems (known as Linux distributions) are built.

summary: Counter-Strike: Source blends Counter-Strike's award-winning teamplay action with the advanced technology of Source technology. Featuring state of the art graphics, all new sounds, and introducing physics, Counter-Strike: Source is a must-have for every action gamer.

company.description: Valve's debut title, Half-Life, was released in 1998. It won more than 50 game of the year awards, and PC Gamer even called it the Best PC Game Ever. Since then, we've released dozens of titles that changed the world. Today, millions of people play our games every day.
company.name: Valve Corporation

name: Counter-Strike Online 2
summary: Counter-Strike Online 2 is the sequel to Counter-Strike Online. Licensed by Valve Software to Nexon Corporation, it is officially released since 2013 and powered by the Source engine.
